description: This is a source file defining application configuration settings for a FastAPI project. It includes functions for parsing environment variables, extracting database URLs, and a dataclass 'Settings' that encapsulates environment-driven configuration parameters such as server host, port, CORS origins, logging level, environment mode, and database connection URL.

classes.name: Settings
classes.description: Immutable configuration class that loads environment variables at runtime to provide application settings such as host, port, CORS origins, and database URL.

methods.name: bool _parse_bool(value: Optional[str])
methods.description: Safely parse a string value to a boolean based on common true indicators.

methods.name: Union[str,List[str]] _parse_cors_origins(raw: Optional[str])
methods.description: Parse CORS origins string or list from environment variable, handling wildcards and comma-separated values.

methods.name: str _ensure_async_driver(url: str)
methods.description: Ensure the PostgreSQL database URL uses the asyncpg driver scheme.

methods.name: Optional[str] _extract_postgres_url(text: str)
methods.description: Extract PostgreSQL connection URL from free-form text or tokens.

methods.name: Optional[str] _read_db_url_from_connection_file()
methods.description: Attempt to locate and read a database connection URL from various known file paths or a glob search.

methods.name: "Settings" load()
methods.description: Class method to load configuration settings from environment variables with fallback to configuration files and path searches.
